title: GitHub action: `/msbuild-check <repo-name>`
body:
# Background
It should be possible to run certain jobs out of scope _user story 8461_ via commenting `/msbuild-check <repo-name>` in PR in MSBuild repo.

This comment should trigger GitHub action, which starts the job for selected preconfigured repo in scope of _user story 8461_ using MSBuild built from this PR
